variables_extracted: Study characteristics (authors, year, country, sample size)
Participant demographics (age, sex, Long COVID duration)
Neurocognitive outcomes (attention, memory, executive function, processing speed, global cognition)
Effect sizes (Hedges g, standardized mean differences)
Neuropsychological tests used (WAIS, WMS, D-KEFS, etc.)
extraction_form: NeuroCog Extractor v2.0 - specialized for Long COVID research
data_management: Stored in structured format with version control
